short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension make the shopping so easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rebatus is a "RaaS" Rewarding program for users looking to save on their purchases, earn some extra cash and for sellers looking to retain customers and reward them.
Rebatus rewards shoppers with a minimum of 100% of their purchase's value + some extra cash in their wallet, along with earning tickets that can be used to participate in deals, games or activities organized for the Rebatus users community.
